item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> ðŸ“šInside the Gas | Sanazâ€™s Blog Sanazâ€™s Blog | Fa Tutorials Projects Blog Books ðŸ“šInside the Gas April 14, 2025 Â· 2 min Shlomo Veneziaâ€™s story is one of survival and unimaginable hardship. Born into a poor Jewish-Italian community, his early life was relatively safe under the protection of the Italians, but everything changed when the Germans invaded and deported his family to Auschwitz. Tragically, his mother and sisters were killed upon arrival, likely in the gas chambers.
